title: Queue Times at Efteling Park
description: The Eftel Times is a personal project that combines my passion for Efteling with web development, making live queue times easily accessible.

modal.title: The Eftel Times
intro: Once upon a time, I developed <1>The Eftel Times</1>, a <1>queue time tracker</1> for the Efteling park. I built this to combine my passion for the park with my technical know-how.
The design is inspired by typical Efteling elements, yet paired with a clean, approachable style influenced by Duolingo — making it clear this is a personal project rather than an official product.

Instead of querying Efteling’s internal API directly, the backend uses ThemeParks API, which is explicitly designed for third-party applications like this. A <1>Django</1> backend transforms and <1>caches the results</1> to avoid excessive load, and serves them to a modern <1>React</1> frontend.

features.title: Key Features
list: <1>Live queue times</1>: pulled responsibly from an API, with caching to avoid unnecessary load.
<1>Responsive design</1>: built for both desktop and mobile with a clean, modern UI.
<1>Robust backend</1>: Django service with caching and data transformation for stable performance.

impact.title: Results
impact.text: The Eftel Times is an exercise in my knowledge of designing and deploying <1>full-stack web applications</1>. Beyond the technical challenge, this project let me combine my <1>passion for Efteling</1> with hands-on technical know-how, combining <1>responsible API integration</1>, caching, and backend architecture with a <1>user-friendly React interface</1>. The result is both a practical tool and a showcase of how I bring personal interests and professional skills together.
